GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Returns the properties for the specified storage account including but not limited to name, SKU name, location, and account status. The ListKeys operation should be used to retrieve storage keys.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Asynchronously creates a new storage account with the specified parameters. If an account is already created and a subsequent create request is issued with different properties, the account properties will be updated. If an account is already created and a subsequent create or update request is issued with the exact same set of properties, the request will succeed.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The update operation can be used to update the SKU, encryption, access tier, or tags for a storage account. It can also be used to map the account to a custom domain. Only one custom domain is supported per storage account; the replacement/change of custom domain is not supported. In order to replace an old custom domain, the old value must be cleared/unregistered before a new value can be set. The update of multiple properties is supported. This call does not change the storage keys for the account. If you want to change the storage account keys, use the regenerate keys operation. The location and name of the storage account cannot be changed after creation.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes a storage account in Microsoft Azure.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all the storage accounts available under the given resource group. Note that storage keys are not returned; use the ListKeys operation for this.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: CheckStorageAccountNameAvailability
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Checks that the storage account name is valid and is not already in use.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetStorageAccounts
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all the storage accounts available under the subscription. Note that storage keys are not returned; use the ListKeys operation for this.

OtherOperations.Name: GetKeys
OtherOperations.Description: Lists the access keys or Kerberos keys (if active directory enabled) for the specified storage account.

OtherOperations.Name: RegenerateKey
OtherOperations.Description: Regenerates one of the access keys or Kerberos keys for the specified storage account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetAccountSas
OtherOperations.Description: List SAS credentials of a storage account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetServiceSas
OtherOperations.Description: List service SAS credentials of a specific resource.

OtherOperations.Name: Failover
OtherOperations.Description: A failover request can be triggered for a storage account in the event a primary endpoint becomes unavailable for any reason. The failover occurs from the storage account's primary cluster to the secondary cluster for RA-GRS accounts. The secondary cluster will become primary after failover and the account is converted to LRS. In the case of a Planned Failover, the primary and secondary clusters are swapped after failover and the account remains geo-replicated. Failover should continue to be used in the event of availability issues as Planned failover is only available while the primary and secondary endpoints are available. The primary use case of a Planned Failover is disaster recovery testing drills. This type of failover is invoked by setting FailoverType parameter to 'Planned'. Learn more about the failover options here- https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/common/storage-disaster-recovery-guidance

OtherOperations.Name: EnableHierarchicalNamespace
OtherOperations.Description: Live Migration of storage account to enable Hns

OtherOperations.Name: AbortHierarchicalNamespaceMigration
OtherOperations.Description: Abort live Migration of storage account to enable Hns

OtherOperations.Name: RestoreBlobRanges
OtherOperations.Description: Restore blobs in the specified blob ranges

OtherOperations.Name: RevokeUserDelegationKeys
OtherOperations.Description: Revoke user delegation keys.

OtherOperations.Name: GetPrivateLinkResources
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a storage account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get properties of specified deleted account resource.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetDeletedAccounts
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists deleted accounts under the subscription.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the managementpolicy associated with the specified storage account.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Sets the managementpolicy to the specified storage account.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes the managementpolicy associated with the specified storage account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the blob inventory policy associated with the specified storage account.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Sets the blob inventory policy to the specified storage account.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes the blob inventory policy associated with the specified storage account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the specified private endpoint connection associated with the storage account.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Update the state of specified private endpoint connection associated with the storage account.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Update the state of specified private endpoint connection associated with the storage account.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes the specified private endpoint connection associated with the storage account.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List all the private endpoint connections associated with the storage account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the object replication policy of the storage account by policy ID.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update the object replication policy of the storage account.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create or update the object replication policy of the storage account.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes the object replication policy associated with the specified storage account.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List the object replication policies associated with the storage account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the local user of the storage account by username.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update the properties of a local user associated with the storage account

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create or update the properties of a local user associated with the storage account

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes the local user associated with the specified storage account.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List the local users associated with the storage account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetKeys
OtherOperations.Description: List SSH authorized keys and shared key of the local user.

OtherOperations.Name: RegeneratePassword
OtherOperations.Description: Regenerate the local user SSH password.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Returns the properties for the specified encryption scope.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Synchronously creates or updates an encryption scope under the specified storage account. If an encryption scope is already created and a subsequent request is issued with different properties, the encryption scope properties will be updated per the specified request.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Update encryption scope properties as specified in the request body. Update fails if the specified encryption scope does not already exist.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all the encryption scopes available under the specified storage account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the properties of a storage account’s Blob service, including properties for Storage Analytics and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Sets the properties of a storage account’s Blob service, including properties for Storage Analytics and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets properties of a specified container.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new container under the specified account as described by request body. The container resource includes metadata and properties for that container. It does not include a list of the blobs contained by the container.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates container properties as specified in request body. Properties not mentioned in the request will be unchanged. Update fails if the specified container doesn't already exist.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes specified container under its account.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all containers and does not support a prefix like data plane. Also SRP today does not return continuation token.

OtherOperations.Name: SetLegalHold
OtherOperations.Description: Sets legal hold tags. Setting the same tag results in an idempotent operation. SetLegalHold follows an append pattern and does not clear out the existing tags that are not specified in the request.

OtherOperations.Name: ClearLegalHold
OtherOperations.Description: Clears legal hold tags. Clearing the same or non-existent tag results in an idempotent operation. ClearLegalHold clears out only the specified tags in the request.

OtherOperations.Name: Lease
OtherOperations.Description: The Lease Container operation establishes and manages a lock on a container for delete operations. The lock duration can be 15 to 60 seconds, or can be infinite.

OtherOperations.Name: EnableVersionLevelImmutability
OtherOperations.Description: This operation migrates a blob container from container level WORM to object level immutability enabled container. Prerequisites require a container level immutability policy either in locked or unlocked state, Account level versioning must be enabled and there should be no Legal hold on the container.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the existing immutability policy along with the corresponding ETag in response headers and body.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates or updates an unlocked immutability policy. ETag in If-Match is honored if given but not required for this operation.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Aborts an unlocked immutability policy. The response of delete has immutabilityPeriodSinceCreationInDays set to 0. ETag in If-Match is required for this operation. Deleting a locked immutability policy is not allowed, the only way is to delete the container after deleting all expired blobs inside the policy locked container.

OtherOperations.Name: LockImmutabilityPolicy
OtherOperations.Description: Sets the ImmutabilityPolicy to Locked state. The only action allowed on a Locked policy is ExtendImmutabilityPolicy action. ETag in If-Match is required for this operation.

OtherOperations.Name: ExtendImmutabilityPolicy
OtherOperations.Description: Extends the immutabilityPeriodSinceCreationInDays of a locked immutabilityPolicy. The only action allowed on a Locked policy will be this action. ETag in If-Match is required for this operation.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the properties of file services in storage accounts, including CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Sets the properties of file services in storage accounts, including CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets properties of a specified share.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new share under the specified account as described by request body. The share resource includes metadata and properties for that share. It does not include a list of the files contained by the share.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates share properties as specified in request body. Properties not mentioned in the request will not be changed. Update fails if the specified share does not already exist.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes specified share under its account.

OtherOperations.Name: Restore
OtherOperations.Description: Restore a file share within a valid retention days if share soft delete is enabled

OtherOperations.Name: Lease
OtherOperations.Description: The Lease Share operation establishes and manages a lock on a share for delete operations. The lock duration can be 15 to 60 seconds, or can be infinite.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the properties of a storage account’s Queue service, including properties for Storage Analytics and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Sets the properties of a storage account’s Queue service, including properties for Storage Analytics and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the queue with the specified queue name, under the specified account if it exists.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new queue with the specified queue name, under the specified account.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Creates a new queue with the specified queue name, under the specified account.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes the queue with the specified queue name, under the specified account if it exists.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all the queues under the specified storage account

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the properties of a storage account’s Table service, including properties for Storage Analytics and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Sets the properties of a storage account’s Table service, including properties for Storage Analytics and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the table with the specified table name, under the specified account if it exists.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new table with the specified table name, under the specified account.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Creates a new table with the specified table name, under the specified account.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes the table with the specified table name, under the specified account if it exists.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all the tables under the specified storage account
